abstract: Stocks plummeted on Wall Street on Tuesday after a business survey provided another strong signal that the U.S. may be in the early stages of a recession.
snippet: Stocks plummeted on Wall Street on Tuesday after a business survey provided another strong signal that the U.S. may be in the early stages of a recession.
lead_paragraph: Stocks plummeted on Wall Street on Tuesday after a business survey provided another strong signal that the United States may be in the early stages of a recession. The Dow Jones industrial average closed down 370 points.

headline.main: Dow Off 370 Points on Weak Business Survey
